# NSToolbar.DisplayMode.iconOnly

**Case**

The toolbar displays only an icon for each item.

## Declaration

```swift
case iconOnly
```

## Display modes

- **NSToolbar.DisplayMode.default**: The default display mode.
- **NSToolbar.DisplayMode.iconAndLabel**: The toolbar displays an icon and label for each item.
- **NSToolbar.DisplayMode.labelOnly**: The toolbar displays only a label for each item.
